price: ߊ߬ߦߌ߫ ߸ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߣߵߊ߬ ߟߊߦߟߍ߬ ߟߴߊ߬ ߖߍ߬ߘߍ ߝߍ߬، ߓߊߏ߬ ߊߟߊ߫ ߦߋ߫ ߣߌ߬ߣߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߥߘߋ߬ߥߘߋ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: بَل رَّفَعَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَيۡهِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: bal rafaʿahu al-lahu ilayhi wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
